Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class Printer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.Printer
public class Printer
extends java.lang.Object
Everything that has to be shown on the player's CLI is printed out by this class. It also read every player's input.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Printer()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean askQuestion()
    Used when it needs to simply print a question which required an Yes/No answer.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> chooseLeaderCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> leadersToChoose, PlayerData data)
    Used at the start phase of the game when player has to choose 2 out of 4 leader card: print them and makes the player choose.
    Resource chooseResource()
    Used at the start phase of the game when player can choose some resources to add to his warehouse.
    boolean chooseStats()
    Used when player wants to see his status or other players' to ask which one wants to see.
    void endgame​(EndgameUpdate endgameUpdate)
    At the end of the game prints the winner and each player's victory points.
    Resource getFreeOne​(Resource[][] market)
    From market's situation derives the free one resource, in this way is not necessary to send the information into the Update.
    java.lang.String printDevCardID​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cardID, PlayerData data)
    Prints all the production power the player can use when wants to produce and make him choose one of them.
    int printIntegers​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> ints, boolean slots, boolean canDiscard)
    Used to make player choose one of warehouse levels when he takes resources from market or to make player choose one of the board's slot when he buy a development card.
    java.lang.String printLeaderCardID​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cardID, PlayerData data)
    Prints all the leader cards the player can choose and make him choose one of them.
    MappedResource printMappedRes​(java.util.ArrayList<MappedResource> mappedRes)
    Prints the MappedResources received as parameter and make player choose one of them.
    MarketArray printMatrix​(Resource[][] matrix)
    Print market's matrix and ask the player to choose one between row or column and then the index.
    void printMessage​(java.lang.String message)
    Used to print a simple message to the player, doesn't need any input.
    void printMyStats​(PlayerData data)
    Print player's status.
    void printOtherStats​(OtherPlayerData data)
    Print other player's status.
    Resource printResource​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resource)
    Ask the player which resource it needs using a number as input from the stdin.
    TurnState printTurnStates​(java.util.ArrayList<TurnState> turnStates)
    Prints all the possible action that can be done by the player at the moment and make him choose one of them.
    void printWareHouse​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource[]> warehouse)
    Used to simple print the player's warehouse situation, doesn't need any input.
    void viewMarket​(Resource[][] matrix)
    Used to simple print the market's matrix situation, doesn't need any input.

  • Method Details

    • printMappedRes

      public MappedResource printMappedRes​(java.util.ArrayList<MappedResource> mappedRes)
      Prints the MappedResources received as parameter and make player choose one of them.
      Parameters:
      mappedRes - the MappedResources.
      Returns:
      the chosen MappedResource.

    • printTurnStates

      public TurnState printTurnStates​(java.util.ArrayList<TurnState> turnStates)
      Prints all the possible action that can be done by the player at the moment and make him choose one of them.
      Parameters:
      turnStates - the actions the player can do.
      Returns:
      the action chose by the player.

    • printDevCardID

      public java.lang.String printDevCardID​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cardID, PlayerData data)
      Prints all the production power the player can use when wants to produce and make him choose one of them.
      Parameters:
      cardID - the IDs of the productions the player can use.
      data - the data
      Returns:
      the production power's string the player chose.

    • printLeaderCardID

      public java.lang.String printLeaderCardID​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cardID, PlayerData data)
      Prints all the leader cards the player can choose and make him choose one of them.
      Parameters:
      cardID - the IDs of the leader card the player chose.
      data - the player that has to do the choice.
      Returns:
      the leader card's string the player chose.

    • printIntegers

      public int printIntegers​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> ints, boolean slots, boolean canDiscard)
      Used to make player choose one of warehouse levels when he takes resources from market or to make player choose one of the board's slot when he buy a development card.
      Parameters:
      ints - the number of slot or warehouse level.
      slots - true if player has to choose a slot, false if has to choose a warehouse level.
      canDiscard - true if is possible to discard the resource, false if not.
      Returns:
      the choice.

    • printResource

      public Resource printResource​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resource)
      Ask the player which resource it needs using a number as input from the stdin.
      Parameters:
      resource - the resources that the player might choose.
      Returns:
      the resource chosen by the user.

    • printMatrix

      public MarketArray printMatrix​(Resource[][] matrix)
      Print market's matrix and ask the player to choose one between row or column and then the index.
      Parameters:
      matrix - the market situation at the moment.
      Returns:
      a MarketArray.

    • askQuestion

      public boolean askQuestion()
      Used when it needs to simply print a question which required an Yes/No answer.
      Returns:
      the true if the answer is Yes, false if it is no.

    • chooseStats

      public boolean chooseStats()
      Used when player wants to see his status or other players' to ask which one wants to see.
      Returns:
      true if wants to see his, false if wants to see other players'.

    • printOtherStats

      public void printOtherStats​(OtherPlayerData data)
      Print other player's status.
      Parameters:
      data - the player who wants to see other players' status.

    • printMyStats

      public void printMyStats​(PlayerData data)
      Print player's status.
      Parameters:
      data - the player.

    • chooseLeaderCard

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> chooseLeaderCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> leadersToChoose, PlayerData data)
      Used at the start phase of the game when player has to choose 2 out of 4 leader card: print them and makes the player choose.
      Parameters:
      leadersToChoose - the 4 leader cards to choose.
      data - the player.
      Returns:
      the 2 leader card chosen.

    • chooseResource

      public Resource chooseResource()
      Used at the start phase of the game when player can choose some resources to add to his warehouse. Print them and makes the player choose.
      Returns:
      the resource

    • endgame

      public void endgame​(EndgameUpdate endgameUpdate)
      At the end of the game prints the winner and each player's victory points.
      Parameters:
      endgameUpdate - the EndgameUpdate.

    • printMessage

      public void printMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Used to print a simple message to the player, doesn't need any input.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to print.

    • viewMarket

      public void viewMarket​(Resource[][] matrix)
      Used to simple print the market's matrix situation, doesn't need any input.
      Parameters:
      matrix - the market's matrix.

    • printWareHouse

      public void printWareHouse​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource[]> warehouse)
      Used to simple print the player's warehouse situation, doesn't need any input.
      Parameters:
      warehouse - the player's warehouse.

    • getFreeOne

      public Resource getFreeOne​(Resource[][] market)
      From market's situation derives the free one resource, in this way is not necessary to send the information into the Update.
      Parameters:
      market - the market situation.
      Returns:
      the free one.
